turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to order something from Starbucks to have on the way home, can you put in an order for me?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure I can just let me know what you want and where I need to order like the location.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Fort Worth 76108 and I will look at the menu real quick.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay take your time no problem.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay I want a Black and White Mocha and a Blueberry scone.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay what time will you be picking this up?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: At 5 pm tonight

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay do you want anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No that will be all for now,

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay let me find a starbucks and I will get the info.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: okay sounds great

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay the starbucks 132 W Loop 820 S, Fort Worth, TX 76108 is closest to you is that okay?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes I pass by that everyday that will be great.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay putting in the order now.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay see if you can get any coupons?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I checked nothing is available currently.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay that's great is the order under my name?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes it's under your name and it should be ready to go, is there anything else I can do?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's perfect, thank you so much for your help.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Thank you and have a lovely day
